Thoughts?

item.title: Raised max level with the combat rework! (and the Crucible) - BTS #4
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Every MMORPG is unique in its own way, RuneScape is just adapting popular and tested techniques to help make gameplay more fun while still having its own twist. You can compare the graphics style too, RS really isn’t like any other game in that aspect either.

Read full topic

item.title: Raised max level with the combat rework! (and the Crucible) - BTS #4
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You guys are making me angry.

It’s not turning into WoW, it’s turning into a normal MMORPG. You know, the ones that have been popular for years without shrinking the way RS was. It’s implementing features that are tried and tested in the realm of gaming, and there is nothing wrong with that, especially with something as monumental as an action bar. Need I mind you that RS is 99% click based, and the action bar will make many tasks easier. Like you can see in the picture, you can put items on there and it makes it easier to use them. This works for skilling as well, so you could put something like a log or alchemy onto your action bar and you wouldn’t need to keep switching interfaces

Read full topic
